name: Santiago Rincon Cortes
title: I'm Santi Rincon, a Frontend Developer
Description: I'm a Frontend Developer with extensive experience in web development. I am passionate about technology and am always looking for new ways to improve my skills and knowledge. My focus is on creating scalable and efficient web and mobile applications to improve the user experience.
develop: Develop user layout designs in a functional way so users can interact with content easily and intuitively.
